email.title: Cocktail Masterclass with DoCSoc – Tickets Out Tomorrow
email.text:
Drowning in revision and waiting for the end of exams? We're bringing you a virtual Cocktail making master class to drink away those post exam blues!
Join DoCSoc on this **Cocktail Masterclass held by Mix and Muddle**!
Tickets include: A box containing ingredients for 4 cocktails as well as a cocktail shaker! All you will need is some glassware and ice!
Tickets are priced at £5 and will be **released at 5pm tomorrow** (26th of April) on Eventbrite. You will then have 2 hours to confirm and purchase the product from the Imperial College Union Shop.
**You can only buy a Union Shop ticket if you have an Eventbrite placeholder ticket.**
Eventbrite Tickets Available: https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/docsoc-end-of-exams-cocktail-masterclass-tickets-152153590485
We hope to see you there (virtually)!
_Please note:_ * _You must be aged 18 or over on the 15th of May to take part._ * _You must have a UK home to deliver the kits to. If you are based outside of the UK please let us know at docsoc@ic.ac.uk and we can see what we are able to arrange for you._
